snippets.name: Timezone Fix for MemberPress Coupons
snippets.desc:
Forces MemberPress Coupons to use the correct Timezone as defined in Wordpress General Settings.

Coupons with a Start date or Expiry date will run from 00:00:00 on the start date until 11:59:59 on the expiry date in the specified Timezone (instead of the MemberPress default timezone, UTC).
